text: Beverly Hills Cop II is a 1987 American action comedy movie directed by Tony Scott and starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, JÃ¼rgen Prochnow, Ronny Cox, John Ashton, Brigitte Nielsen, Allen Garfield. It is the second movie in the Beverly Hills Cop franchise and is the sequel to the 1984 movie Beverly Hills Cop. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. The movie won 1 Razzie Award and was nominated for an Academy Award and for a Golden Globe Award in 1988. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1987 action movies Category:1987 comedy movies Category:1980s sequel movies Category:Beverly Hills Cop Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies directed by Tony Scott
title: Beverly Hills Cop II
